item.title: 18.02 Multivariable Calculus
item.description: This is my personal notes about 18.02 course MIT OCW Introduction This course covers differential, integral and vector calculus for functions of more than one variable. These mathematical tools and methods are used extensively in the physical sciences, engineering, economics and computer graphics. Thanks you so much MIT for creating and sharing your courses in MIT OCW. I created this notes for myself, but I’d like to share with everybody.
